data.description: Join Nokia Bell Labs as a Machine Learning and AI Intern student and work with the Statistics and Data Science Research Group. You’ll collaborate with statisticians, computer scientists, and engineers to advance state-of-the-art Machine Learning and AI techniques and solutions. In this role, you’ll prototype systems to showcase research innovations and may even contribute to publications in top conferences and journals. The environment is collaborative and supportive, giving you the chance to learn, grow, and contribute to research that drives a more innovative and inclusive future.
